];const RestaurantList=_ref=>{let{selectedCategory,searchTerm}=_ref;const{addToCart}=useCart();const[message,setMessage]=useState('');const filteredItems=selectedCategory?foodItems.filter(item=>item.category.toLowerCase()===selectedCategory.toLowerCase()):foodItems;const searchedItems=searchTerm?filteredItems.filter(item=>item.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())):filteredItems;const handleAddToCart=item=>{addToCart({...item,quantity:1});setMessage(item.name+' added to cart!');setTimeout(()=>setMessage(''),3000);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[message&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{position:'fixed',top:'10px',right:'10px',backgroundColor:'#d32f2f',color:'white',padding:'10px 20px',borderRadius:'8px',zIndex:1000},children:message}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"food-list",style:{display:'grid',gridTemplateColumns:'repeat(auto-fill, minmax(180px, 1fr))',gap:'20px'},children:searchedItems.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"food-item-card",style:{border:'1px solid #ddd',borderRadius:'8px',padding:'10px',backgroundColor:'white'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:`/food/${item.id}`,style:{textDecoration:'none',color:'inherit'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.image,alt:item.name,style:{width:'100%',borderRadius:'8px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:item.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:'flex',justifyContent:'space-between',fontSize:'14px',color:'#555'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["\u2B50 ",item.rating]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["$",item.price.toFixed(2)]})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleAddToCart(item),style:{marginTop:'10px',backgroundColor:'#d32f2f',color:'white',padding:'8px 12px',border:'none',borderRadius:'6px',cursor:'pointer',width:'100%'},children:"Add to Cart"})]},item.id))})]});};export default RestaurantList;
